knimeNode.name: JSONPointer
knimeNode.shortDescription: Selects certain values from the a JSON column.

intro.p: JSONPointer can be used to select certain parts from a JSON value.
When the specified part cannot be found, missing value will be added.
This node uses the fge/jackson-coreutils implementation.

fullDescription.option: The JSON column to select the contents from

The expected result type. (If something is found at that path we try to convert to the expected type and return that value. If not found, missing value will be returned. You can set the date details you want to keep.)
When checked, the source column will be removed

ports.inPort: A table containing a JSON column
ports.outPort: Table containing the pointed parts of JSON column
